events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it because the product is not as described and I want a refund.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request for money back and return of product.
Assigning this refund case to the refund specialist team for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your order and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was defective and did not match the description on your website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the product at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate the help and will return the product as soon as possible.
Your refund request has been processed and the shipping label emailed to you. Please send back the defective product to complete the refund.
Just checking in to ensure you have returned the product and to confirm if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I returned the package yesterday. Thank you for following up, I look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund has been completed on our end. We are closing the case now. Thank you for your cooperation and please contact us if you need anything else.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
I completed the survey and I am very satisfied with the way my refund case was handled. Thank you for your support.
This case has been archived automatically after resolution and feedback collection.
